candidate Profile Description.summary: Results-oriented and seasoned professional with over 5 years of experience in the technology and computer industry. Adept in all phases of the software development lifecycle, from requirement analysis and design to development and reviews. Possess a comprehensive background as a computer science graduate with over 8 years of programming expertise. Demonstrated proficiency in object-oriented programming, computer applications, and code testing. Proven team player with a collaborative nature, coupled with a strong willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies. Passionate about contributing to the entire organizational framework and driven to solve complex problems. Holds a profound understanding of algorithms, data structures, databases, network protocols, configurations, and security measures.

responsibilities: Spearheaded initiatives at TATA Consultancy Services, driving innovation and delivering impactful solutions.
Elevated the system's performance by enhancing both the frontend (JavaScript/React-HTML/CSS) and backend (Python/Django).
Functioned as a Lead Analyst, providing support and enhancement to hospital and healthcare systems at Kaiser Permanente.
Contributed to the dynamic environment of Startup 360, a leading IT media platform.
Optimized and enhanced the user experience of the system by improving algorithms and data structures in both the frontend and backend.

professional_skills: Exhibits exceptional teamwork and management skills within Agile environments.

education.degree: Master of Science in Cyber Security Engineering
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
